alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester and northeastern Franklin Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montague, or 7 miles southeast of Greenfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Orange, Deerfield, Athol, Winchendon, Montague, Ashburnham, Sunderland, Northfield, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Phillipston, Gill, Royalston, New Salem, Wendell and Warwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western and central Massachusetts.
